long_description: Super versatile, the Marmot Curbside Daypack carries your 15 in. laptop, tablet and skateboard all at the same time. In winter, switch the board for a snowboard and you're good to go. Padded sleeve fits most 15 in. laptops; a separate internal sleeeve can hold a tablet or e-reader. External straps secure a skateboard or snowboard. External slash pocket stows on-the-go essentials. Webbing waist belt can be removed; sternum strap stabilizes the load. Internal organizer and key clip. Marmot Curbside Daypack provides gear and water bottle pockets for your active adventures.
short_description: Super versatile, the Marmot Curbside Daypack carries your 15 in. laptop, tablet and skateboard all at the same time. In winter, switch the board for a snowboard and you're good to go.
